text: ttohan naneun geudaedeul-egeseo naon sado han myeong-eul geudaedeul-ege bonaeeoss-euni geuneun geudaedeul-ege naui jingpyoleul nangsonghago geudaedeul-eul kkaekkeus-i hamyeo geudaedeul-ege seongseowa jihyeleul galeuchigo geudaedeul-i alji moshaessdeon geos-eul geudaedeul-ege galeuchyeo judeola
